Verses: 1 karththaraagiya Dhevanudaiya Aaviyaanavar Enmel Irukkiraar; Sirumaippattavargalukku Suviseshaththai Arivikkak Karththar Ennai Abishegampanninaar; Irudhayam Norungundavargalukkuk Kaayankattudhalaiyum, Siraippattavargalukku Vidudhalaiyaiyum, Kattundavargalukkuk Kattavizhththalaiyum Kooravum,
2 karththarudaiya Anukkiraga Varushaththaiyum, Nammudaiya Dhevan Needhiyai Sarikkattum Naalaiyum Kooravum, Thuyarappatta Anaivarukkum Aarudhal Seyyavum,

3 seeyonile Thuyarappattavargalai Seerppaduththavum Avargalukku Saambalukkup Padhilaaga Singaaraththaiyum, Thuyaraththukkup Padhilaaga Aanandha Thailaththaiyum, Odungina Aavikkup Padhilaagath Thudhiyin Udaiyaiyum Kodukkavum, Avar Ennai Anuppinaar; Avargal Karththar Thammudaiya Magimaikkendru Naattina Needhiyin Virutchangalennappaduvaargal.
4 avargal Nedunkaalam Paazhaaikkidandhavaigalaik Katti Poorvaththil Nirmoolamaanavaigalai Eduppiththu Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaai Idindhukidandha Paazhaana Pattanangalaip Pudhidhaaikkattuvaargal.
5 marujaadhiyaar Nindrukondu Ungal Mandhaigalai Meyththu, Anniya Puththirar Ungal Pannaiyaatkalum, Ungal Dhraatchaththottakkaararumaayiruppaargal.

6 neengalo Karththarin Aasaariyarendru Sollappaduveergal; Ungalai Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Panividaikkaararenbaargal; Neengal Jaadhigalin Selvaththai Anubaviththu, Avargal Magimaiyaikkondu Menmaipaaraattuveergal.

7 ungal Vetkaththukkup Padhilaaga Irandaththanaiyaai Balan Varum; Lachchaikkup Padhilaagath Thangal Paagaththil Sandhoshappaduvaargal; Adhinimiththam Thangal Dhesaththil Rattippaana Sudhandharam Adaivaargal; Niththiya Magizhchchi Avargalukku Undaagum.
8 karththaraagiya Naan Nyaayaththai Virumbi, Kollaipporulinaal Idappatta Thaganapaliyai Verukkiren, Naan Avargal Kiriyaiyai Unmaiyaakki, Avargalode Niththiya Udanpadikkai Pannuven.

9 avargal Sandhadhiyaanadhu Jaadhigalin Naduvilum, Avargal Sandhaanamaanadhu Janangalin Naduvilum Ariyappattirukkum; Avargalaip Paarkkira Yaavarum Avargalkarththaraal Aaseervaadham Petra Sandhadhiyendru Arindhukolvaargal.

10 karththarukkul Poorippaai Magizhugiren; En Dhevanukkul En Aaththumaa Kalikoorndhirukkiradhu; Manavaalan Aabaranangalinaal Thannai Alangariththukkollugiradharkum, Manavaatti Nagaigalinaal Thannai Singaariththukkollugiradharkum Oppaaga, Avar Ratchippin Vasthirangalai Enakku Uduththi, Needhiyin Saalvaiyai Enakkuth Thariththaar.

11 boomi Than Poondugalai Vilaivippadhupolavum Thottam Thannil Vidhaikkappattavaigalai Mulaivippadhupolavum Karththaraagiya Aandavar Ellaa Jaadhigalukkum Munbaaga Needhiyaiyum Thudhiyaiyum Mulaikkappannuvaar.
